Package: gov.noaa.messageapi.conditions

[Java] Class CompositeCondition

      • gov.noaa.messageapi.conditions.CompositeCondition
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        ICompositeCondition

        public class CompositeCondition
extends BaseCondition

        A composite condition is a condition that holds a list of other condition (either composite or comparison) ids and and holds an operator (either 'and' or 'or'). Composite conditions extend the BaseCondition.

        Authors:
        Ryan Berkheimer

          • java.lang.Object value

        • Constructor Detail

          • public CompositeCondition(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> conditionMap)

            Constructor for creating a new CompositeCondition from a map. This is usually used by the schema when bootstrapping a new session.

            Parameters:
            conditionMap - A map holding all required condition parameters.

          • public CompositeCondition(ICompositeCondition condition)

            Copy constructor for creating a new CompositeCondition from an existing one. This is generally used in immutable operations when creating new records during request building.

            Parameters:
            condition - The original condition to copy

        • Method Detail

          • @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("unchecked") /** * Returns the list of conditions held by this condition as a List of Strings. * This is a convenience method for getValue that performs the cast before returning. * @return A List of condition Ids held by this condition */ public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getConditions()

          • public java.lang.Object getValue()

            Returns the list of condition Ids held by this condition as an object

            Returns:
            The list of condition ids that make up this condition as an object

          • public void setValue(java.lang.Object value)

            sets the value for a composite condition. In a composite condition, the value is a list of the ids of other conditions.

            Parameters:
            value - A list of condition ids
